name: Alternative Gravity
description:
You have no other options.. You have some unknown urge to reach the end of a never ending barrage of cataclysmic tunnels. At least you have the ability for change the direction of gravity to help you in your dangerous endevour.

Controls:

Android:

Swipe up or down: Change Gravity

Tap: Jump!

PC:

Left Shift: Change Gravity

Space: Jump!
